nodes.short_description:
Mannequin is a free-to-play hide-and-seek VR FPS for up to 5 players.

Two Agents hunt for Mannequins - shape-shifting aliens that blend in by posing as human statues.

They ambush unsuspecting Agents, freezing them in place with a single touch. Agents use cutting edge tech to scan for Mannequins, then shooting to kill. They must decipher friend from foe. Hit a human and their gun jams, leaving them vulnerable. Last team standing wins in this frantic game of cat and mouse.

Mannequin est un jeu en RV multijoueur social et furtif en 2 contre 3.

Des agents d'élite traquent les mannequins, des extraterrestres métamorphes qui se font passer pour des statues humaines.

Ils tendent des embuscades aux agents, les figeant sur place d'un seul geste. Les agents utilisent une technologie de pointe pour scanner et tuer les mannequins. Ils doivent distinguer leurs alliés de leurs ennemis et leurs armes s'enrayent s'ils tirent sur un humain. Les survivants gagnent la partie.

最大2v3で遊べるソーシャルステルスVRマルチプレイゲーム、『Mannequin』。

変身能力を持つエイリアン「マネキン」を狩るのは、ふたりの凄腕エージェントだ。マネキンは人間の彫像のようなポーズをとりながら身を潜めている。

マネキンたちは油断したエージェントに襲いかかり、たった一度触れただけでエージェントの動きを止めてしまう。エージェントは最先端の装備を駆使してマネキンを探しだし、射殺するのが任務だ。そのためには敵と味方を見分けなければならない。人間を撃つと銃が使えなくなってしまい、戦闘力が低下する。最後まで残っていたチームがこの狂気のかくれんぼゲームの勝者となる。

Mannequin ist ein Stealth-VR-Spiel für bis zu 2 gegen 3 Spieler.

Zwei Elite-Agenten jagen Mannequins: Aliens, die sich als menschliche Statuen tarnen.

Sie überfallen unachtsame Agenten und können sie mit der kleinsten Berührung einfrieren lassen. Agenten nutzen daher High-Tech-Scanner, um die Mannequins zu enttarnen und zu erschießen. Wer ist Freund, wer ist Feind? Wer versehentlich einen Menschen trifft, kann nicht mehr schießen! Welches Team gewinnt das Katz-und-Maus-Spiel?

Mannequin es un juego de sigilo de RV multijugador de hasta 2c3.

Dos agentes de élite deben cazar mannequins: aliens metamorfos que se esconden y simulan ser estatuas. 

Así sorprenden a los agentes desprevenidos y los congelan con un toque. Los agentes, que deberán diferenciar a los aliados de los enemigos, usan tecnología de vanguardia para escanear a los mannequins y eliminarlos. Si le disparan a un humano, sus armas se atascarán y quedarán expuestos. El último equipo en pie gana el juego.

Mannequin은 2vs3 구도의 소셜 잠입 VR 멀티플레이어 게임입니다.

마네킹은 인간 흉내를 내면서 군중에 섞인 채 자신을 숨기는 변신형 외계인으로, 이러한 마네킹을 두 명의 정예 에이전트가 수색하게 됩니다. 

마네킹은 방심한 에이전트를 습격해 단 한 번의 접촉만으로 에이전트를 얼려버리는 능력이 있습니다. 그리고 에이전트는 최첨단 장비로 무장해 마네킹을 스캔한 뒤 처치해 버릴 수 있습니다. 즉, 에이전트에게 피아식별은 필수라고 할 수 있겠죠. 인간을 맞추게 되면 총기가 무력화되면서 에이전트 역시 취약해집니다. 그렇게 쫓고 쫓기는 광란의 게임은 마지막까지 남은 팀이 승리를 거머쥐게 됩니다.

nodes.long_description:
Mannequin is an up to 2v3 asymmetrical VR multiplayer game! Two elite Agents hunt for Mannequins - shape-shifting aliens hiding in plain sight and blending in by posing as human statues. They ambush unsuspecting Agents, freezing them in place with a single touch.

Agents use cutting edge tech to scan for Mannequins, then shooting to kill. They must decipher friend from foe. Hit a human and their gun jams, leaving them vulnerable. Last team standing wins in this frantic game of cat and mouse.

THE WORLD STANDS STILL
Crisis engulfs the globe. Select sites have frozen in time, turning people into motionless statues. An alien presence is behind these anomalies. Special Agents are dispatched to eradicate this threat before they become the next victims. 

STRIKE A POSE
Hunted by mankind, Mannequins use supernatural abilities to get the drop on Agents. Use your headset and controllers to pose and blend in among first responders. Strike when Agents least suspect, dashing forward and freezing them with a touch of a hand.

EXTERMINATE THE ALIEN THREAT
Agents are on the hunt. Their EMF Readers point them towards Mannequins, but telling friend from foe is down to instinct. Not only is ammunition limited, but shooting a human jams your gun, giving Mannequins an opportunity to strike.

WORK TOGETHER, DIE ALONE
Teamwork is essential. Strategize to seize energy extractors as aliens, letting you see an Agent’s location. If you’re not fast enough, Agents gain the upper hand.
